jump_scares.spoiler: An infected slams onto the window of the kitchen door
Another infected slams onto the kitchen door
An infected’s arm breaks through the window
A woman appears screaming for help
An infected guest suddenly lunges at Koldo from within the police car
An infected’s arm breaks through the door
An infected reaches through the window and kills one of the characters
An infected suddenly runs out in front of Clara
The Medeiros girl from the first two films appears in the TV screen’s reflection behind Koldo
SpongeJohn appears from the darkness
As the light flickers on, an infected appears behind the glass window
The same infected bursts through the window and attacks Natalie
An infected appears in the kitchen door window
An infected attacks Clara
A man opens the door revealing Eddie in his non-human state
The cop searching for the beast is suddenly grabbed
A Facehugger jumps out of the egg and lands on Kane’s helmet
Dallas accidentally kicks something over, causing Ripley to cry out in surprise
The Facehugger drops onto Ripley’s shoulder
The Facehugger twitches as Ash pokes it
Blood spurts out of Kane’s chest and a few seconds later an alien bursts out of it
A cat hisses and runs away
The alien comes into view behind Brett
An alien appears in front of Dallas. [Video]
Ash grabs Parker
The cat jumps out at Ripley
An alien hand extends out in front of Ripley
The rover door is suddenly opened after the children question where the adults are
Burke puts his face near a tank when suddenly one of the creatures slams against the inside wall of the tank
The team walk through a corridor when a silhouette runs past the screen
One of the crew members finds a body which suddenly opens its eyes when its head is lifted
An alien attached to the wall jumps off to grab one of the crew members
An alien pokes its head through the door before the group begin to leave
Ellen emerges from underneath the bed and is suddenly attacked by a small alien
After setting off the sprinklers, Ellen is jumped at again by the small alien
One of the men looks into the vents and spots a group of aliens approaching
Pvt. Vasquez looks at an upwards opening in the vent and spots an alien coming down
The pair start to go up the elevator when an alien reaches in
When the crew land, Bishop is attacked by an alien
Ellen’s ankle is grabbed as she tries to climb the ladder
Herbert yells “Boo!
The oil slick jumps onto Rachel hand and eats her alive
Mrs. Lansing hits a hitchhiker with her Mercedes
The dead hitchhiker, jump into Mrs. Lansing’s window
A door opens from behind Dr. William Weir
Weir is grabbed on his shoulder from behind
Miller is startled by a floating hand that appears from behind
A disfigured face pops out from behind one of the crew members as she investigates a stuck CD
The lights flicker then Weir sees a person appear next to him
Lights explode around one of the crew members
Something bangs heavily on the door
Flashing images occur as Miller puts his head against the wall
Peters falls down a hole in the ground
D.J. gets attacked after spinning around
One of the crew member’s helmets is opened dramatically
A creatures comes out of the orb and attacks his face
An axe goes through the door
A man hits the window of the door and begins yelling
Ass the light is turned on, Crawford charges forward with an axe
The fuse box catches fire
A hand grabs Julia by her leg
One of Frank’s bodies falls through as door as Kirsty approaches
Kirsty reaches into the box but is suddenly zapped as her hand gets close
Kirsty opens a closet and a Jesus sculpture falls out
A demon appears over Kirsty’s shoulder

movies.title: Harvested 2 – The Legend of Harold Rice

jump_scares.spoiler: Girl appears in kitchen
Woman sleeping on couch and monster appears
Girl on her phone and monster appears behind her
Killer grabs a victim from behind
Killer stabs victim
Jang Kyung-chul breaks the window of the car
Jang Kyung-chul leaps from the left and tackles Jang Se-yun
A man appears in front of the car and gets hit
For the next one-and-a-half-minutes there is a fast montage of flashy, sometimes scary looking images
The body-double suddenly opens his eyes
There is a sudden cut to a man shooting a vase
Jacob sees some birds flying above him at the party
Jacob sees a horn come out of Jezzie’s mouth as she dances
A sudden cut to a car braking and hitting a bike might startle some viewers
Jacob sees the reflection of his son in the mirror and reaches out to touch it however a demon head appears and he pulls back
A sudden sound of smashing dishes
As Maddox is in the water, a floating dead body bumps into her
A chain is suddenly put around a girls neck from behind
A door is pushed open by a girl with a bloody face
Jennifer bumps into her IV stand during a quiet and tense scene
A door suddenly slams shut
A man grabs Jennifer’s shoulders from behind
Inga, the chimpanzee, suddenly appears on the car’s windshield
A hand appears from behind Jennifer and grabs her
A young boy turns around to show a severely disfigured face
A hand grabs Jennifer’s foot while she is swimming underwater
Morris is suddenly decapitated
Frau Brückner is stabbed from behind
The cat jumps up at Dan’s face
The body suddenly jolts upwards and begins yelling
Megan’s father abruptly hits his head on the window behind Megan
A hand breaks through the door while Dan and Megan are talking
The phone rings during a scene transition
Laura screams and falls back in her chair
The camera flashes to Laura on the ground with a loud soundtrack noise
Trevor speaks from offscreen and Rose drops her wine glass
The home security alarm goes off and Rose drops her glass
The phone rings suddenly
The phone rings suddenly again
Rose awakens abruptly from a nightmare
The demon abruptly screams at Rose during a tense scene
The camera cuts to a smiling partygoer standing very close to Rose with an accompanying sound effect
The demon screams Rose’s name and the scene abruptly changes
The scene cuts to a mangled cadaver
Holly’s head unnaturally drops from her shoulders and dangles in front of the car window
The demon grabs Rose’s face and proceeds to scream
The doctor knocks on Rose’s car window, startling her
The camera cuts back to the doctor who is now replaced by a smiling Carl with blood dripping from his mouth
Rose’s mother yells her name
The demon grabs the door that Rose is trying to close
The demon appears behind Rose and throws her against the wall
Joel begins running at Rose with an associated loud sound effect
Rose turns to see she is back at her childhood home
A man gets attacked by a crazed animal
The group run over something on the road while driving
Seth goes to touch the road-kill when suddenly it jumps up at him
Something bangs on the door
One of the infected bodies slams against the door
The group rotate to see a cop wielding a gun outside the front door
As Seth pulls the police radio through the window, one of the infected hosts jumps down from the gas station roof. [Video]
The infected hand begins to run at the couple
An infected body jumps on the car while Seth is inside
An infected jumps out from behind one of the gas station stands
Louise attempts to bite Evan
The camera cuts back from the casket to Petrie standing behind Billy, who startles him
Some viewers might be startled at two stabbings at this point
Woman says “talk to me” and turns to see a man in front of her
Woman says “talk to me” again and a woman appears in front of her
Woman barks like a dog suddenly
Man says “I let you in” and head tilts backwards
Boy bites girl in the hand
Some viewers might be startled at man lunging at woman
A child appears in the broken window to the left accompanied by a scream
A sudden phone call may startle some viewers
While Loomis is asleep, you hear a scream and are suddenly inside the game and the red lady (countess Elizabeth Bathory) approaches
As Loomis walks down the stairs, we suddenly see the lady in red scream
A sudden noise and figure in the kitchen
A sudden cut to a train’s “bell” may startle some viewers
After Phineas says “lighter works” fire erupts the screen with a scream
Hutch looks inside the peeping hole and his friend Swink suddenly appears
A sudden cut to an action scene of the game may startle some viewers
The red lady runs up from behind and kills Miller Banks
After Hutch asks if Miller will try to get back into the game, a figure appears running in the hallway with a startling sound
Sudden cut to flames
Sudden cut to kid approaching
A car horn may startle some viewers
A bloody girl walking in the back may startle some viewers
A figure suddenly appears on the road
October sees a girl in the window accompanied by a sound
Sudden cut to a doll with worms
The table Abigail leans on suddenly breaks
Sudden sound and the red lady approaches
An isopod crawls out of a fish
A swimmer is pulled under water
Accompanied by a high pitched screeching noise, the diver is attacked by an isopod
Donna screams as some blood falls on her
An apparently dead man’s eyeball suddenly moves
A loud gunshot may startle some viewers (this is followed by a second gunshot a few seconds later)
A car crashes into the mayor’s vehicle
Stephanie is about to start the cop car when a diseased person jumps up from the back seat and grabs her. [Video]
Scene cut to stuffed pig with snort sound
Mom walks away revealing a figure behind her (no sound
Door shuts
Bloody face appears with loud sound
Woman turns into a bloody face
Kid jumps out to scare the other kids
A teen hold a jar with a spider in it. The jar suddenly breaks
Door opens with Credence standing there accompanied by a loud sound effect
Dominic appears behind the girls and grabs them as they scream
A hand knocks out the garbage bag
The woman suddenly takes the hand of Detective Muldoon
After the radio has tuned out, a girl is suddenly standing on the street
After the monster looks out of the bathtub Peter suddenly hits the window pane and frightens his wife
The monster suddenly jumps up from the edge of the bed. This happens with an extremely loud sound effect
Detective Muldoon is pushed into the sink from behind
Goodman’s colleague shoots himself off-screen. The sound is very startling
When Goodman’s colleague in the car turns around again, a screaming woman knocks on the car window. This is very startling
The camera pans to the left where suddenly a zombie stands in the light cone
Hands suddenly come out of the bathtub and reach for Peter
Peter turns around and suddenly the dead woman stands in front of him and screams at him
Suddenly the screaming ghost appears in the left corner of the cupboard
A screaming ghost appears over Faith. The sound effect is very sudden
A screaming ghost appears in the car behind Lorna
When Detective Muldoon turns off the light, a ghost appears before her
The ghost appears once again
The ghost suddenly opens the door
Just after the son runs into the dark corner of the room, the female ghost comes out of it shortly after and murmurs to Detective Muldoon
After it turns out that it is not Muldoon’s real son in her arms, the screaming spirit of a child suddenly appears in her arms
Brundlefly bursts through the glass window of the hopsital room where Veronica is about to have an abortion
Brundlefly jumps down from the ceiling onto Borans
As Gloria approaches the car, she is attacked from behind
Behind Thomas there is suddenly a man in a mask
From the dark corner of the room a screaming man suddenly shoots out
When Thomas turns around, two people in cape stand behind him
Something appears behind Heidi
Camera cuts to an old lady
A strange baby-like creature with extra extremities starts screeching
As Jesse approaches the motel door there is a loud bang
Sarah suddenly appears in the hallway and attacks Jesse
Mike suddenly grabs Lisa from behind
As the speaking character turns around to face the camera, they are unexpectedly shot in the chest in the middle of a calm monologue with no warning
As a character slowly backs into a large window behind them, a giant fleshy tentacle suddenly slams against it from the other side

While a character screams a triumphant phrase, a giant tentacle suddenly falls on them with a loud thud and squishes them, halting the uplifting music score and instantly shifting the tone of the scene
Lars scares Derek by shouting “boo” from behind him
The creature suddenly escapes from the block of ice. [Video]
One of The Thing’s tentacles shoots out and impales Henrik
As Lars enters a building, he is grabbed by something and pulled inside
A miniature “Thing” jumps at Kate
The Thing bursts through a window in front of Carter
One of The Thing’s tentacles suddenly lashes out at Kate as she inches towards the grenade
A dog leaps out at Clark
Something moves past a doorway in front of Fuchs
Norris and Nauls attack MacReady from behind
Copper attempts to defibrillate Norris when a giant hole opens in Norris’s chest. [Video]
Palmer’s blood has a violent reaction when MacReady tests it with the copper wire
Blair appears behind Garry
The ground begins to erupt in front of MacReady
A man breaks through a door
Accompanied by a sound effect, a masked figure appears on the previously black screen
Accompanied by a sound effect, Allison ducks down to reveal Dr. Powell watching her from the doorway
A man is shown with his neck suddenly cut open
The lights cut out suddenly
Maggie has a sudden vision of a grotesque creature which causes her to fall backwards in fear
The creature’s foot stamps on the ground
Simon opens a door and Kim rushes out
A girl narrates about her respect for her policeman father, who is looking at the camera and smiling. Suddenly, his head explodes
The mutant jumps out from behind some cops
The man in the black coat walks past in the background accompanied by a string sound effect
As Max pulls the trigger in the tape, the TV suddenly explodes and innards begin to fly out of it
Maxine is looking at the kitchen, when the old lady appears behind her
As Maxine is running through the grass away from the house, Wayne suddenly grabs her
After RJ starts driving, the old woman appears in front of the car
Something is pushed through the hole in the wall, Wayne is looking through
After Lorraine pulls the trigger for the lightbulb, there is a sudden cut to Wayne getting the spikes pulled out of his head
Lorraine turns on the light and the naked, cuffed body of RJ is shown
Howard suddenly appears in front of Jackson
Maxine realizes who is laying next to her and screams
Bobby-Lynn opens the door and sees the old woman running towards her
While Lorraine is trying to unlock the door, her hand gets smashed by the owner of the house
The woman slaps Bobby-Lynn after she’s trying to help her
Bobby-Lynn is thrown into the lake
A crocodile attacks Bobby-Lynn
Lorraine jumps up from behind the door and screams
When Lorraine runs out of the house, she gets shot from the side
Lorraine makes a surprising noise which scares Howard
